description: Numerator of [x^(2n)] of the Taylor expansion cosh(cosec(x)-cot(x))=1 +x^2/8 +3*x^4/128 +59*x^6/15360 +871*x^8/1474560 +....
comments: The coefficients of the e.g.f of x/2, cosh(cosec(x)-cot(x)) = 1 +1*x^2/(2^2*2!) + 9*x^4/(2^4*4!) +177*x^6/(2^6*6!) +6097*x^8/(2^8*8!)+.. are apparently the absolute values of A003711.
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Values replaced by numerators - R. J. Mathar, Dec 19 2011
